title: Warring Kingdoms Katarina ! @KateyKhaos or Other Super Important Rioter !
body:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nTGXZ1J.jpg[/img]

If this is the inspiration behind Katarina's newest skin, why are her pants black and gold ?  Are there plans to make her pants look more like this picture ?

Why does the top not look more similar ? Why some kind of weird under shirt ?

What is going on with kats eyes ? They seem to be painted red and her facial skin is whiter than usual. (guessing this is intended)

I liked her hair solid black better but this pink and black is ok, looks like something jinx or vi would wear but the flowers do not fit kat either so................

2 years is a long time to wait for a skin, and who knows if kat will ever get another. Just making sure you guys give Kat your best.

For the love of {{champion:55}}

replies.body:
Keep in mind that inspiration isn't the same thing as creating a copy. :] We use a bunch of references for inspiration, not just one! 

With that being said, the Warring Kingdoms Katarina that's on PBE is pretty close to the final version.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-01-18T04:19:28.893+0000)
>
> Keep in mind that inspiration isn't the same thing as creating a copy. :] We use a bunch of references for inspiration, not just one! 
> 
> With that being said, the Warring Kingdoms Katarina that's on PBE is pretty close to the final version.

I completely agree with the main post. I think i speak for a lot of people when i say this. We don't really like the black pants. The dress Diao Chan has in the photo above is what we want! The big problem with this skin currently is that it looks too much like the other skins we already have (*cough* bilgewater *cough*). It doesn't look unique at all and it looks extremely unexciting and dull including the effects, especially when compared to Slay Belle. 

Slay Belle was really unique and great. Unique colours, completly new clothing style, new obvious effects. I personally think it would look amazing if you put a dress like in this photo above on her. I want this skin to look unique! Something new that is not like any other Katarina skin! Hopefully you understand what i mean.

A response on your thoughts would be awesome. This means alot to us Katarina players that you hear us. Thank you heaps!

Btw what does everyone else think of my thoughts?

> [{quoted}](name=Revelsa,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2015-01-19T10:01:16.924+0000)
>
> I completely agree with the main post. I think i speak for a lot of people when i say this. We don't really like the black pants. The dress Diao Chan has in the photo above is what we want! The big problem with this skin currently is that it looks too much like the other skins we already have (*cough* bilgewater *cough*). It doesn't look unique at all and it looks extremely unexciting and dull including the effects, especially when compared to Slay Belle. 
> 
> Slay Belle was really unique and great. Unique colours, completly new clothing style, new obvious effects. I personally think it would look amazing if you put a dress like in this photo above on her. I want this skin to look unique! Something new that is not like any other Katarina skin! Hopefully you understand what i mean.
> 
> A response on your thoughts would be awesome. This means alot to us Katarina players that you hear us. Thank you heaps!
> 
> Btw what does everyone else think of my thoughts?

I'm sorry that you're not a big fan of the new Katarina skin.

One of the things we originally noticed when we put Katarina on PBE was that her hair was really close to the Bildgewater Katarina skin. We changed her hair to an ombre to A. make it look a bit different than her other skin, and B. break up the wall of black that a player would sometimes see if they're looking at her back.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2015-01-19T18:52:17.728+0000)
>
> I'm sorry that you're not a big fan of the new Katarina skin.
> 
> One of the things we originally noticed when we put Katarina on PBE was that her hair was really close to the Bildgewater Katarina skin. We changed her hair to an ombre to A. make it look a bit different than her other skin, and B. break up the wall of black that a player would sometimes see if they're looking at her back.

If nothing else, I personally like her new recall. =P Kind of spam it, and she keeps tossing up her blade. Kind of like with Pool Party Renekton's recall, spam it to keep the chair appearing. So that's what I like about her recall, and the sound it makes is pretty nice, too.

Who animated the recall on her new skin??

> [{quoted}](name=ChimeiTekinaNasu,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=0007000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T19:20:47.842+0000)
>
> If nothing else, I personally like her new recall. =P Kind of spam it, and she keeps tossing up her blade. Kind of like with Pool Party Renekton's recall, spam it to keep the chair appearing. So that's what I like about her recall, and the sound it makes is pretty nice, too.
> 
> Who animated the recall on her new skin??

Riot Whist! :D He's always got awesome ideas for recalls.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=00070001000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T19:22:08.361+0000)
>
> Riot Whist! :D He's always got awesome ideas for recalls.

Tell that guy (or gal) I love him (or her) !

I really agree with what revelsa was saying about her pants legging things / booties. It isnt that I hate the skin (I am totally gonna buy it on all 4 accounts :P) it just could be so much more. It really feels like you guys are rushing it out there when it could be a absolutely amazing skin with just a little bit more work. 

Kat has a lot of skins and it just feels like this is it for her, and I want the skin to be as op as the recall animation and a full build uninterrupted ultimate.

If I worked at riot (and had talent) I would totally stay late for free to make this the best Kat skin ever. I guess I am just a crazy Kat luver though.

**For the Love of** {{champion:55}} 

P.S. Does getting this skin rule out the Pool Party Katarina skin that we were teased with in the ziggs splash ?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=00070001000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T19:22:08.361+0000)
>
> Riot Whist! :D He's always got awesome ideas for recalls.

Oh, nice. Tell him I said he did a good job on it. =3 Does he do the animation for all, or almost all champ's recall??

> [{quoted}](name=ChimeiTekinaNasu,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=000700010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T19:23:57.429+0000)
>
> Oh, nice. Tell him I said he did a good job on it. =3 Does he do the animation for all, or almost all champ's recall??

He does some, we've got a few animators on the team!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=0007000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T19:25:35.495+0000)
>
> He does some, we've got a few animators on the team!

Oooh. Hmmm... Who did Void Fizz recall?? I REALLY like that one.

> [{quoted}](name=ChimeiTekinaNasu,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=00070001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T19:29:23.233+0000)
>
> Oooh. Hmmm... Who did Void Fizz recall?? I REALLY like that one.

That's...before my time! I'm not sure off hand, I'll have to ask!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=000700010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T19:32:12.876+0000)
>
> That's...before my time! I'm not sure off hand, I'll have to ask!

lol. Okay.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2015-01-19T18:52:17.728+0000)
>
> I'm sorry that you're not a big fan of the new Katarina skin.
> 
> One of the things we originally noticed when we put Katarina on PBE was that her hair was really close to the Bildgewater Katarina skin. We changed her hair to an ombre to A. make it look a bit different than her other skin, and B. break up the wall of black that a player would sometimes see if they're looking at her back.

I see. I still think though that by changing the hair colour to Ombre still does not fix the unique skin issue very well compared to say changing her clothing style/colour theme. I do like the hair colour change though, good start.

I still do like the skin idea don't get me wrong, i just believe it has way more potential just as Kat Head is saying a few posts above. Daym, that sweet new recall though!  

I'm glad you guys are aware of our thoughts however. Thank you for your response Katey!

And yeah, not a big fan of those tentative changes to Kat, but they are all just tentative at this point.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-01-18T04:19:28.893+0000)
>
> Keep in mind that inspiration isn't the same thing as creating a copy. :] We use a bunch of references for inspiration, not just one! 
> 
> With that being said, the Warring Kingdoms Katarina that's on PBE is pretty close to the final version.

So no hope for her one piece leggings/boots ? Thanks again for the info katey !
......I'm just going to save this picture...for no reason whatsoever.

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-17T22:26:05.168+0000)

I can't say why, but i get really happy whenever i see your name, love your stories bro
Well as long as that happiness doesn't last more than 4 hours.....

Looks like I'm a little late to the party, but I suppose it's best that I do express my feelings towards this skin.

Just another declared Katarina main here, and I have to agree with the majority of the community that Warring Kingdoms Katarina is indeed underwhelming. Don't get me wrong, I love the idea of a new Katarina skin. I'm really glad that Riot even considered giving her a new one. I just want the last skin for her foreseeable future to be something of grandeur. As of now, Katarina has 7 skins with an RP value that is 975 or less. Considering the importance that I believe she has to the League of Legends image (This is a champion seen on nearly every piece of promotional art and has been showcased in every cinematic) I personally feel that Katarina deserves at the least one a 1350 RP skin. If that means we don't see it for another year, then so be it. 

Does this skin here have the potential to be that valuable? Absolutely. Just take Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao for example. Is it worth that price now? No, not quite. The closest thing in Katarina's wardrobe to that value would definitely be Sleigh Belle. That is a very unique skin with a gorgeous splash art. If this skin can be on the same level as the Snowdown concept, my discomfort would be soothed. I only ask that my opinion be heard by those who are interested. Thank you, and have a nice day. : )

> [{quoted}](name=iBrayson,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pJlyReni,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-01-20T15:34:19.065+0000)

>

Don't get me wrong, I love the idea of a new Katarina skin. I'm really glad that Riot even considered giving her a new one. I just want the last skin for her foreseeable future to be something of grandeur. As of now, Katarina has 7 skins with an RP value that is 975 or less. Considering the importance that I believe she has to the League of Legends image (This is a champion seen on nearly every piece of promotional art and has been showcased in every cinematic) I personally feel that Katarina deserves at the least one a 1350 RP skin. If that means we don't see it for another year, then so be it. 
>

The closest thing in Katarina's wardrobe to that value would definitely be Sleigh Belle. That is a very unique skin with a gorgeous splash art. If this skin can be on the same level as the Snowdown concept, my discomfort would be soothed. I only ask that my opinion be heard by those who are interested. Thank you, and have a nice day. : )

Its never too late to the party, thanks for contributing! 

100% agree with all your points friend. Riot, read this guys summary! You've perfectly summed up our thoughts better than i could. Katarina deserves a great, high tier skin like Warring Kindoms Jarvan and Xin, even if we have to wait longer for this skin. 

Anyone here have a PBE account btw?
